task.title: Viewing a meeting recording
task.shortdesc: Meetings that are recorded for meetings that you own are displayed by tapping Meeting Recordings on the main menu or from the menu for a specific meeting.

context.p: To obtain a recording from the main menu, tap Meeting Recordings and then tap the play button to view the recording.
To obtain a recording from a meeting menu, tap Meetings Recent . Tap the menu icon for the desired meeting and then Meeting Recordings. You can then click the play button to view the recording.
